    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra¶

    Specialized methods for defining and analyzing boundaries for Guidelines standards.

    These methods (functions) provide rely on scipy of sympy for core computations, and may provide improved precision than core functions, but tend to have poor performance

    Module Contents¶

    class mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra.GuidelinesBoundaryCallable[source]¶
    boundary_function : collections.abc.Callable[[numpy.typing.NDArray[numpy.float64]], numpy.typing.NDArray[numpy.float64]][source]¶
    area : float[source]¶
    s_naught : float = 0[source]¶
    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra.dh_area_quad(_dh_val=0.01, /, *, prec=9)[source]¶

    Area under the ΔHHI boundary.

    When the given ΔHHI bound matches a Guidelines safeharbor, the area under the boundary is half the intrinsic clearance rate for the ΔHHI safeharbor.

    Parameters:¶
    _dh_val : float¶

    Merging-firms’ ΔHHI bound.

    prec : int¶

    Specified precision in decimal places.

    Returns:¶

    Area under ΔHHI boundary.

    Return type:¶

    float

    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra.hhi_delta_boundary_qdtr(_dh_val=0.01, /)[source]¶

    Generate the list of share combination on the ΔHHI boundary.

    Parameters:¶
    _dh_val : float¶

    Merging-firms’ ΔHHI bound.

    Returns:¶

    Callable to generate array of share-pairs, area under boundary.

    Return type:¶

    GuidelinesBoundaryCallable

    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra.shrratio_boundary_qdtr_wtd_avg(_delta_star=0.075, _r_val=0.85, /, *, weighting='own-share', recapture_form='inside-out')[source]¶

    Share combinations for the share-weighted average GUPPI boundary with symmetric merging-firm margins.

    Parameters:¶
    _delta_star : float¶

    corollary to GUPPI bound (\(\overline{g} / (m^* \cdot \overline{r})\))

    _r_val : float¶

    recapture ratio

    weighting : Literal['own-share', 'cross-product-share'] | None¶

    Whether “own-share” or “cross-product-share” (or None for simple, unweighted average)

    recapture_form : Literal['inside-out', 'proportional']¶

    Whether recapture-ratio is MNL-consistent (“inside-out”) or has fixed value for both merging firms (“proportional”).

    Returns:¶

    Array of share-pairs, area under boundary.

    Return type:¶

    GuidelinesBoundaryCallable

    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions_extra.shrratio_boundary_distance(_delta_star=0.075, _r_val=0.85, /, *, agg_method='arithmetic mean', weighting='own-share', recapture_form='inside-out', prec=5)[source]¶

    Share combinations for the GUPPI boundaries using various aggregators with symmetric merging-firm margins.

    Reimplements the arithmetic-averages and distance estimations from function, shrratio_boundary_wtd_avg but uses the Minkowski-distance function, scipy.spatial.distance.minkowski for all aggregators. This reimplementation is useful for testing the output of shrratio_boundary_wtd_avg but runs considerably slower.

    Parameters:¶
    _delta_star : float¶

    corollary to GUPPI bound (\(\overline{g} / (m^* \cdot \overline{r})\))

    _r_val : float¶

    recapture ratio

    agg_method : Literal['arithmetic mean', 'distance']¶

    Whether “arithmetic mean” or “distance”.

    weighting : Literal['own-share', 'cross-product-share'] | None¶

    Whether “own-share” or “cross-product-share”.

    recapture_form : Literal['inside-out', 'proportional']¶

    Whether recapture-ratio is MNL-consistent (“inside-out”) or has fixed value for both merging firms (“proportional”).

    prec : int¶

    Number of decimal places for rounding returned shares and area.

    Returns:¶

    Array of share-pairs, area under boundary.

    Return type:¶

    mergeron.core.guidelines_boundary_functions.GuidelinesBoundary
